评论详情: I have only worn these twice to work. They are practically new, although I ordered them 3 months ago.  I was lacing them up yesterday and one of the side straps which holds the laces, popped out! As you can see in the image, these shoes are practically new and there is no reason for them to fall apart so soon. Bummed, not sure if they will refund me given it's been a few months and I don't have the original box. Maybe if they see this review, they will offer me a refund in good faith!

评论概述: Reasonable looking wise toe box shoe
评论详情: The show itself was fine. I was looking for a wide toe box shoe for holidaying mainly. Whilst the overlook was ok there was something off about the fit. I think it was the sole which is very rigid. I returned this shoe.

Oddly enough, they are too narrow. I can feel my little toe curling under. This is not what I wanted in a barefoot shoe. The shoe is also somewhat stiff. Sadly, I am returning them. I really wanted to like them. :(
Looking good and comfortable Light. Fashion looks

While wide, the shoe ran short. It has the appearance of a loaf of bread when on. The workmanship is not great, especially given the high price. There was brown glue that had oozed out and dried on the visible part of the shoe. The tongue has exposed foam. The shoe looks and feels cheap and absolutely not worth the money.

评论用户: No Public Name, for the last time!
评论详情: Otherwise a great shoe. It’s a crying shame the toebox is an abject disaster.

It can be tricky to find ‘cute’ barefoot shoes! I loved the look of these. Clean, simple, even a bit trendy with the white, touch of blue, and brown soles! They were a half size too big but otherwise were great.

评论概述: XERO is a company that offers no customer assistsnce.
评论详情: XERO is a company that offers NO customer assistance. They only offered to contact them via email, and when I did, the reply took much longer than they promised. As a new potential customer, I was left to my own devices and had to learn from trial and error with this company that advertises widely. This Kelso Shoe was too small in size, although it was a larger size than another XERO shoe I ordered and returned. I returned the shoes.
She likes them so much she purchased a second pair.

评论概述: Supreme comfort for feet and body alignment.
评论详情: UPDATE:  Good as gold. Comfortable, durable (so far), legs & feet definitely feel better with them, especially when I take time to walk.I was apprehensive about trying the Xero heel shoes partly because I really needed them to be right and comfort my feet, both of which have moderate bunion & concurrent alignment issues. In addition, I've had bad experiences with two well-known shoe brands that badly affected alignment (-IT band inflammation), causing pain and other problems. Since those experiences I've been wary about buying shoes. But the Kelso Xero shoe is unexpectedly so right for both feet. I feel better, walk better, and sleep better since i started wearing these shoes and expect to purchase another pair pretty soon. I'd been feeling apprehensive about extended travel, but now I feel I might be Ok with walking longer distances in the Kelsos. Maybe even an extended pilgrimage.  I've only had the Kelsos for a few days, and I'll update after a while. But I've got a good feeling that they're going to be fine. With a 5,000 mile guarantee, I feel confident that they'll wear well, too.
No break in period. Was able to wear all day w/o any problems!
I absolutely love them, these are my fourth pair of Xeros. The feel like they have the most cushioning out of the three other styles I have. Xero have become my go to shoe.

I'm new to the barefoot world, and I'm really happy with these shoes. I have wide, flat feet, and these shoes solved my pain when walking. super comfortable!! the only thing that I don't like is that I feel that the shoe sweats a lot with the material of the sole. I really like the design, because even though they are wide they don't look bad. They look stylish.
Love th these shoes, no pain in knees after walking or standing ! Dislike that I  didn’t buy another pair of shoes !
They fit nicely. Plenty of room in toe box. Look great.

I have been thinking about buying these for months and finally pulled the trigger. They are phenomenal. The fit is perfect. There's so much room in the toe box to spread. So comfortable. Fit true to size. I will be buying another pair
My first pair of barefoot shoes - my New Year’s resolution is to fix my problematic feet. These are so attractive, love the lux color & comfy out of the box.

I just recently started exploring barefoot shoes. I have so many different pairs of sneakers and none of them are comfortable. My toes are always killing me and my alignment is always off. These zero drop shoes are a life saver! My toes are happy and so is my back!
All Zero Shoes are great, I prefer the mesh top. Amazon allowed me to try them first, before I buy. Thanks Amazon, Awesome idea.
I love my Kelso Xero shoes so much I’ve  purchased 8 more pair of Xero shoes in different styles. Seriously… you’ve got to try these shoes!

评论概述: Colors are not the exact shade
评论详情: I received my shoes and got very disappointed with the colors. Not as aesthetic as advertised, not beige and pink, they are grey and dusty mauve. I contacted them with the picture and the said this is the actual color. I am returning them :(

I needed these to see if it will help with my post ankle/tendon surgery. My pain has been going on for over a year now. A friend suggested Xero shoes. I chose this pair mainly because it was available to “try before you buy” They are Super cute and comfortable for a bit, but I feel like I need a little bigger size if I want to wear all day, especially if I need to put in a support as instructed by my doctor. I think if I had an opportunity to “try before I buy” on a size a little bigger it would’ve been great. Unfortunately, that option is not available in this color (did I mention these are SUPER CUTE and goes with casual and Sunday best outfits). There is an option for a bigger size in a different color so I will be trying those soon. I’ll keep you posted. Thank you so much.

评论概述: Order a size up from your usual.
评论详情: Fast delivery. This shoe is extremely comfortable - you won’t want to wear anything else.

These are a cute style for zero drop shoes. They are not comfortable for me to wear to do a lot of walking but for light daily wear they are good. I added some arch support insoles and that helps with the comfort. These are wider than the average sneaker but not a real foot shaped toe box. The leather is nice and softens up well.

I really had no idea what to expect when I ordered these shoes for tennis.  I heard barefoot shoes help with joint pain, and I was curious if they would.  I was worried they wouldn't be "right" for tennis and would be funny looking,  They turned out to be absolutely the cutest shoes I've ever worn for tennis, and they feel great when I'm running around on the court.  It is a different feeling, but I like how it connects me to the ground, and I feel like I'm less likely to fall over the taller sole and injure my ankle.  I loved these so much, I ordered a 2nd pair.

Finally comfortable!  Shoes made for feet, I couldn't be happier! I recommend these shoes for women who have hammertoes, sore toes, any kind of foot problem.  Seem to be well-made, and take no "breaking in".

评论概述: My feet feel so much better
评论详情: These are my third pair of Xero shoes. I like that these are stylish and don’t really look like zero drop wide box shoes. My feet feel so much better. Just make sure to follow the guidelines and transition slowly to let your feet adjust

I needed to get shoes with flexible soles for Kung Fu; however, I also wanted shoes that could do double-duty which led me to this shoe. I was hesitant since I never tried barefoot shoes before. I have high arches that collapse and wide feet. The shoes fit perfectly when I tried them on and working out with it made my feet less tired. In addition, I’m able to wear it to the office since it looks nicer.

评论概述: Fantastic tennis show, wide toe box, zero drop, kind to feet
评论详情: These shoes are wonderful because they are zero drop with a wide toe box, but have enough sole that you can give the court a foot pounding without your feet hurting.  They are very comfortable (no breaking in) and stable for great lateral movement.  I like that they are white.  The dark green stripe is good looking.  I wish they would offer more white tennis shoes with other stripe colors.I bought a pair of womens for myself, and mens for my husband.  We both love our new shoes!

评论概述: Very comfortable but hard to clean
评论详情: I really love these shoes and wear them absolutely everywhere. They are very durable. My main complaint is that on the pink shoes the light suede gets very dirty and are hard to clean. I am getting rid of them long before they wore out because they look awful to wear now. I’ve tried the washing machine, stain remover and scrubbing and I can’t get them black out. So if you buy these shoes buy a dark color.

评论概述: So comfortable and really helping my gait.
评论详情: My daughter-in-law recommended I try these shoes. I have trouble walking and the NB shoes were too heavy making it harder to move my feet. I have been buying NB for years but the sole is just too stiff and heavy in my 'old' age.

I liked the solid blackness of the shoe and the mix of materials, but the right shoe was  narrower than the left shoe and going up a bigger size was not going to work. I wanted to use these shoes as wear with anything and at any time and as a first timer get to know the product.

评论概述: Just want I was looking for
评论详情: I wanted a nice looking shoe that had a wider toe box and this fit the bill ! I walk 5/10 miles a day in them while traveling, they are very comfy!

I bought these shoes because I have another pair of Xero trainers that I wear to the gym and thought these might be a good shoe for casual wear. I got the light purple and they are SO cute in person. I also found them comfortable to wear all day and walking long distances. I did find them a little stiff at first but by the end of the day they were broken in. Sadly they did get a crease across the toe, but if you bend your feet that's bound to happen. I usually wear a 7.5 in athletic shoes and that's what I bought - I have enough room in them that I could comfortably wear thicker socks with them if I wanted.
So disappointed with this Xero shoe! This shoe did not bend at all! Extremely stiff, not a minimalist shoe!!!
For barefoot shoes I was shocked at how stiff they were. The sole of the shoe felt like I was wearing a pair of Dutch wooden clogs. I returned.
These shoes run 1/2" small. Other than that, they are very comfortable and just what I wanted. I returned them and ordered 1/2" size up and problem solved. :)

I have a wide feet and I'm normally a size 9 1/2 if the shoes are wide enough.  But, these shoes were really enough and super comfortable. I've always had issues finding shoes, especially zero drop shoes. When you first try them on they'll feel tight, but after some wearing it will break in and be more flexible since it is leather/ suede. These appear to be super durable and will be great since I take lots of walks.

评论概述: Comfortable enough, not as wide as I thought it'd be
评论详情: Comparison between the regular shoes (Taos retro star) that I'm trying to replace with these xero shoes.  - The xero shoes aren't as wide as I thought I'd be, but it means that they don't look funny like clown shoes. - They're both women's size 6, and while the difference looks small and the shoes even look smaller length-wise, my pinky toes and my big toes aren't as cramped in the xero shoes. Though I do think Birkenstock Boston's have wider toebox than these do. - I wish the tongue was also leather, because the running shoe style tongue kind of messes up with the look. But when worn the shoes do look like adidas sambas/onitsuka tigers, which I like. - the shoes are stiff like others said, and I noticed that the shoe bends on the stitching of the lace holders, which does not feel quite natural for me.  All in all, they're comfortable, and I think they're a good fashion oriented zero-drop shoes. I replaced the laces with elastic so they're slip-ons now.

I ordered these shoes for my trip to Europe this summer. Out of the box, they were extremely comfortable. I wore them everyday during my 10 day trip- I hiked 6.5 miles in them and never experienced any discomfort. They are super cute and stylish and I wore them with skirts, shorts and jeans. I love that they are leather and will hold up well. The only downside is that they are made in China which is a bummer. But the upsides of these shoes are many.
Me agrado el estilo muy bonitos,estoy haciendo la transición a pies descalzos y me quedaron perfectos. Me encanto la marca Xero shoes. La recomiendo al 100%.

评论概述: Less flexible then other xeros but not bad.
评论详情: I got these for doing mom stuff in cooler seasons when sandals and barefoot just aren’t practical. They will definitely do for my needs, they are slightly wider then other xeros Iv bought And I’m glad of it. They are stiffer then other xeros but I’m not hugely worried about it as they are still more pliable then other traditional walking shoes. If you need to chase toddler, walk dogs, or move groceries from the car to the house, these will definitely do. 4 stars because they were hard to find in stock and in my size, plus the stiffness isn’t usually how xero does their shoes. Edit: Iv had them for a year now and the flexibility hasn’t improved much, but the shoes are holding up construction wise very well. Over all I’m going to stick with the 4 stars I initially gave them.

I bought these based on the description of how flexible they were.  They are very hard and definitely not flexible.  They were exactly what I was looking for (zero drop, good looking and wide) but I couldn’t even wear them around the house because they hurt my foot due to the rigidity.

评论概述: Not made in USA; Not true to size
评论详情: Most disappointed to find "Made in China" stamped on the sole when the description suggests there are made in USA. I ordered 2 pair of Xero shoes, different styles but the same size.  One pair fits, and this pair does not.  They are very short. I ordered a half-size up for running but the usual extra space in the length is not there.  The shoes are too short for even causal wear.
Terrible sizing
muy prácticos para salir y para ir al gym, ae lavan en la lavadora.. quedan genial, el pie descansa, porque estan muy anchos
